textBeforeTable: Opening Times +44(0) 371 704 1977 Telephone 188-196 Regent Street London W1B 5BT Address --> Login / Create an Account Sweden Denmark
textAfterTable: Lakeside Have an adventure by TRAIN The centre is linked to Chafford Hundred station via a link bridge which is only a 5 minute walk. C2C trains run to and from Fenchurch Street and Southend. Have an adventure by BUS There are many bus routes to the centre from Essex, Kent and London. Buses stop at the Intu Lakeside bus station. Have an adventure by CAR Clearly signposted from junctions 30 and 31 of the M25. The A13, A1306 and West Thurrock way also give direct access to the shopping centre. 13000 free car parking spaces- indoor and outdoor parking. 13,000 free car parking spaces. Have an adventure by BIKE There are cycle routes into Intu Lakeside from Chafford Hundred and Grays. Cycle parking is readily available. Address Hamleys Unit 46-50 Intu Lakeside Shopping Centre West Thurrock Way
